entry.data:
RAIN LIKELY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

RAIN LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

RAIN LIKELY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS AROUND 80

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
